# insuranceconsult.in â€” LLM access guide
# Purpose: Provide a clear, factual overview of this website for assistants and crawlers.
# Owner: M N Rajendrakumar Insurance Services (Sholavaram, Chennai outskirts)
# Focus: Commercial & industrial insurance guidance + personal insurance support.

## Canonical
https://insuranceconsult.in/

## Primary Topics
- Commercial insurance: fleet/transport, contractors plant & machinery (JCB/crane/heavy equipment), warehouse/godown, fire & burglary, marine cargo/transit, workmen compensation, contractor policies.
- Personal insurance: car, bike, health/mediclaim, life.

## Service Areas (Geo)
- Base: Sholavaram
- Nearby/Outskirts: Karanodai, Red Hills, GNT Road / NH corridors, Madhavaram, Manali, Ambattur, Thiruvallur, Perambur and nearby Chennai industrial belts.
Note: Service is provided from Sholavaram and supported across Chennai/outskirts based on requirement and documentation.

## High-value Pages
- English Home: https://insuranceconsult.in/en/
- Services Index: https://insuranceconsult.in/en/services/
- Locations Index: https://insuranceconsult.in/en/locations/
- About: https://insuranceconsult.in/en/about/
- Claims Guidance: https://insuranceconsult.in/en/claims-guide/

## Structured Data
This site uses schema.org JSON-LD for local business and service pages.

## Policies / Accuracy
- No guarantees on claim outcomes.
- Coverage, pricing, and eligibility depend on insurer terms and submitted documentation.
- This site provides guidance and support for selecting suitable coverage.
